meanings.definition: Covered with or characterized by pustules.
meanings.sent1: The pustular rash on his arm was red and bumpy.
meanings.sent2: Her pustular skin condition required medical attention.
meanings.sent3: The pustular spots on the banana made it look like a polka-dotted fruit.
meanings.sent4: The pustular clouds in the sky resembled fluffy cotton balls.
meanings.sent5: The pustular appearance of the infected wound was alarming.

meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or resembling a pustule.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed a cream for the pustular infection.
meanings.sent2: The pustular growth was carefully examined by the dermatologist.
meanings.sent3: The pustular balloon popped with a loud noise at the party.
meanings.sent4: The pustular texture of the mud made it difficult to walk through.
meanings.sent5: The pustular nature of the problem required immediate attention.
